privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Runa Kani, we value your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect, why we collect it, and your rights under the EU GDPR and Peru‚Äôs Law No. 29733.
privacy.collectText: We collect: (a) name/username and email to create and manage your account; (b) minimal session data to keep your access secure (authentication, device identifiers, and single-session control); (c) geolocation coordinates only when you initiate an emergency alert, to include them in the report. We do not access Contacts, Camera, or Photo Gallery. Your PIN is stored locally on your device (never sent to our servers). We do not use Google Maps APIs.
privacy.useText: We use your data to: (a) provide secure access; (b) process reports, including sending emergency coordinates when applicable; (c) send transactional or administrative emails (e.g., verification, security alerts); (d) prevent abuse and fraud (session controls and technical logs). We do not sell your data.
privacy.providersText: We share data only with service providers acting as data processors to operate the app, under our instructions and in compliance with applicable law. Specifically, we use Google Firebase (Authentication for account management; Firestore/Storage for data storage; Cloud Functions for backend logic). We do not sell your data or share it for advertising purposes.
privacy.securityText: We protect your data using encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS), access controls with least-privilege principles, and activity logging. We restrict access to authorized personnel and regularly review our security measures. We apply data minimization and limited retention.
privacy.retentionText: We keep data only as long as necessary to provide the service and meet legal obligations. For reference: (a) incident reports are retained for a maximum of 12 months; (b) when you delete your account, associated data is deleted within 30 days, unless we must retain certain information for legal, security, or fraud-prevention reasons. Any such exceptions will be clearly communicated.
privacy.deletionText: You can delete your account at any time from the app (Settings ‚Üí Help Center ‚Üí My Account ‚Üí Delete account and data). You can also start the request online at {accountDeletionUrl}. Once you confirm deletion, we will erase associated data within 30 days as described in the retention section.
privacy.locationDisclosureText: Runa Kani collects your location only when you initiate an emergency alert, in order to include the coordinates in your report. We do not access your location in the background or outside that scenario. You may deny permission at any time in your system settings.
privacy.rightsText: You may request access, rectification, erasure, objection, restriction of processing, and withdraw consent at any time. To exercise your rights, contact us at safairus@gmail.com. Data is hosted on Firebase/Google Cloud with international transfers under adequate safeguards.
privacy.contactText: If you wish to exercise your rights or have questions about this policy, please contact us.
privacy.controllerText: The Runa Kani application is operated by Diego Henr√≠quez, individual developer, based in Riga, Latvia. For any inquiries regarding your personal data, please contact us at safairus@gmail.com.
privacy.ctaDeletionHelpText: You can do it directly in the app or start the request online.
privacy.ctaDeletionHelpLink: Go to the account deletion page

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of Runa Kani. By using the app, you agree to these terms.
terms.useText: You agree to use the app in compliance with the law and these terms. Geolocation is requested and used only for emergency scenarios you initiate. We do not use Google Maps APIs to send coordinates.
terms.accountText: You are responsible for keeping your credentials confidential. We may send transactional emails (e.g., verification, security alerts). We implement single‚Äësession control and secure local storage of the PIN.
terms.liabilityText: The service is provided ‚Äúas is.‚Äù We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability. We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages. Latvian (EU) law applies, and for users in Peru, Law No. 29733 also applies. Where legal frameworks conflict, the most protective provision for the user shall prevail.

title: Account and Data Deletion
intro: You can request deletion of your Runa Kani account at any time. Follow these steps in the app:
step1: Open Settings ‚Üí Help Center ‚Üí My Account.
step3: Confirm your password to finalize deletion.
note: Alternatively, you can request deletion online from this page. Data is erased within 30 days, except where retention is required for legal, security, or fraud-prevention reasons.
